movies.name: Aquaman And The Lost Kingdom
movies.description: When an ancient power is unleashed, Aquaman must forge an uneasy alliance with an unlikely ally to protect Atlantis, and the world, from irreversible devastation.

cast.description: Jason Momoa is an American model, writer, producer, director, and actor. He is best known for his performance as Khal Drogo in the HBO fantasy television series Game of Thrones (2011-2012). Road to Paloma (2014) was his first film as a writer, actor, producer, and director. In 2016, he was seen in Batman V Superman: Dawn of Justice. His 2017 releases include Once Upon a Time in Venice, The Bad Batch, and Justice League. He was also seen in Aquaman (2018), directed by James Wan. His 2021 release includes Zack Snyder's Justice League. His other notable works include Dune (2021), Slumberland (2022), Fast X (2023), and Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom (2023).

Amber Heard is an American actress. She made her film debut in 2004 in the sports drama Friday Night Lights. After small roles in North Country and Alpha Dog, Heard played her first leading role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006) and appeared in The CW television show Hidden Palms (2007).

Patrick Joseph Wilson is an American actor and singer. He spent his early career starring in Broadway musicals, beginning in 1995. Wilson has appeared in feature films such as The Phantom of the Opera (2004), Little Children (2006), Watchmen (2009), Insidious (2010), The Conjuring (2013), and Aquaman (2018).

Dolph Lundgren is a Swedish actor, filmmaker, and martial artist. Lundgren's breakthrough came in 1985 when he starred in Rocky IV as the imposing Soviet boxer Ivan Drago. He has since starred in more than 40 films, almost all of them in the action genre.

cast.birthplace: New York City, New York, United States
cast.description: Indya Adrianna Moore is an American actor, model, and social activist. They are best known for their role as Angel Evangelista in the television series Pose, making them the first openly transgender person to be nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in any acting category.

Nicole Mary Kidman AC is an Australian actress and producer. She is the recipient of various accolades, including an Academy Award, two Primetime Emmy Awards, and five Golden Globe Awards. Kidman began her acting career in Australia with the 1983 film Bush Christmas.

Peter Safran is an American film producer. He is best known for his collaborations with filmmaker James Wan, producing the highly successful horror films The Conjuring (2013) and The Conjuring 2 (2016), as well as the superhero film Aquaman (2018).

movies.name: Salaar: Cease Fire - Part 1
movies.description: Brace yourself for an extraordinary tale of rebellion filled with power-packed action.

cast.description: Prabhas, also known as 'Rebel Star,' is an Indian film actor known for his work in Telugu and Hindi cinema. He gained international fame for his role in the Baahubali series. Prabhas is one of the highest-paid actors in the Indian film industry.

Prithviraj Sukumaran is an Indian actor, director, playback singer, and producer who works mainly in the Malayalam film industry. He has also appeared in Tamil, Hindi, and Telugu films. Prithviraj is regarded as one of the leading actors in the South Indian film industry.

Shruti Haasan is an Indian actress and singer who works predominantly in the Tamil, Telugu, and Hindi film industries. She is the daughter of actors Kamal Haasan and Sarika Thakur. In addition to her acting career, Shruti is a talented playback singer and has released her own music.

Tinnu Anand is an Indian actor, writer, and director known for his work in Hindi cinema. He has appeared in numerous Bollywood films and is recognized for his versatile performances. Tinnu Anand has also directed several successful films in his career.

Jagapati Babu is an Indian actor known for his work in Telugu cinema. He has received critical acclaim for his versatile roles and has appeared in numerous successful films. Jagapati Babu is also a film producer and playback singer.

Easwari Rao is an Indian actress who has worked in various South Indian films. She is known for her strong performances and has garnered appreciation for her contributions to Indian cinema. Easwari Rao continues to be a respected figure in the film industry.

movies.name: Dunki
movies.description: Four friends from a sleepy little village in Punjab share a common dream: to go to England. Their problem is that they have neither the visa nor the ticket. A soldier alights from a train one day, and their lives change. He gives them a soldier`s promise: He will take them to the land of their dreams. What follows is a hilarious and heartwarming tale of a perilous journey through the desert and the sea, but most crucially through the hinterlands of their mind. A journey that tests and defines them: their courage, their smarts, and the strain of their conflicting ideologies. Dunki is a saga of friendships, borders, nostalgia for home and love that towers above it all.

cast.description: Shah Rukh Khan, also known as the 'King of Bollywood,' is an Indian actor and film producer. He has appeared in more than 80 Bollywood films and earned numerous awards for his contributions to the Indian film industry. Shah Rukh Khan is recognized globally for his charisma and versatile performances.

Taapsee Pannu is an Indian actress who works predominantly in Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu cinema. Known for her strong and impactful roles, Taapsee has garnered critical acclaim for her performances. In addition to acting, she is also involved in modeling and various social causes.

Boman Irani is an Indian film and stage actor, voice artist, and photographer. He has appeared in numerous Bollywood films and is known for his versatility as an actor. Boman Irani has also contributed to the field of photography and is a respected figure in the entertainment industry.

Vicky Kaushal is an Indian actor known for his work in Hindi films. He gained recognition for his performances in critically acclaimed movies like 'Masaan,' 'Raazi,' and 'Uri: The Surgical Strike.' Vicky Kaushal has received several awards for his impactful roles and continues to be a prominent figure in Bollywood.

Vikram Kochhar is an Indian actor who has appeared in various films and television shows. Known for his versatile roles, Vikram has carved a niche for himself in the entertainment industry. He continues to contribute to the world of cinema with his talent and dedication.

Anil Grover is an Indian actor known for his work in Bollywood films and television. With a career spanning several years, Anil has showcased his acting prowess in various genres. He is admired for his natural performances and versatility as an actor.

movies.name: Sam Bahadur
movies.description: Sam Bahadur is a tribute to Field Marshal Sam HFJ Manekshaw, MC, India`s first Field Marshal and a legendary Army General. His career witnessed the shaping of India`s geopolitical borders, and his life was marked by significant milestones, from fighting in World War II to being the Chief of Army Staff during the 1971 Indo-Pakistan war, that led to the creation of Bangladesh.This RSVP film explores his dynamic personality and his unparalleled military career, offering a glimpse into the life of a no-nonsense Army Commander, also known as `Sam Bahadur` by the soldiers he led

cast.description: Vicky Kaushal is an Indian actor known for his work in Hindi films. He gained recognition for his performances in critically acclaimed movies like 'Masaan,' 'Raazi,' and 'Uri: The Surgical Strike.' Vicky Kaushal has received several awards for his impactful roles and continues to be a prominent figure in Bollywood.

Fatima Sana Shaikh is an Indian actress who has worked in Bollywood films and television. She gained widespread recognition for her role as Geeta Phogat in the sports drama 'Dangal.' Fatima is known for her dedication to her craft and her ability to portray diverse characters with authenticity.

Sanya Malhotra is an Indian actress and dancer who made her debut with the film 'Dangal.' Known for her vibrant personality and impressive dance skills, Sanya has become a popular figure in the Indian entertainment industry. She continues to captivate audiences with her performances in various projects.

Shantanu Srivastava is an Indian actor who has made a mark in the film industry with his talent and dedication. With a background in acting, Shantanu has delivered noteworthy performances in various roles. He continues to explore new avenues in the world of cinema.

Kalki Koechlin is an Indian actress known for her work in Bollywood films and on stage. Apart from acting, she is also recognized for her writing and activism. Kalki has received critical acclaim for her performances in films that explore unconventional themes and characters.

Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub is an Indian actor known for his versatile roles in Hindi films and television. He has gained recognition for his impactful performances in various genres, showcasing his range as an actor. Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub is admired for his dedication to his craft and the authenticity he brings to his characters.

movies.name: Jawan
movies.description: A high-octane action thriller that outlines the emotional journey of a man who is set to rectify the wrongs in society.

cast.description: Hailed as the world`s biggest superstar and the King of Bollywood, Shah Rukh Khan is a phenomenon like no other. From his humble beginnings as an outsider in a largely dynastic Hindi cinema to earning the numero uno position in the industry, his rise might seem like a fairytale; but is in fact a testament to the actor`s sheer talent, infectious energy and hard work.
Diana Mariam Kurian, famously known by her stage name, Nayanthara, is an Indian actress who is primarily known for her work in Tamil, Malayalam and Telugu cinema.

cast.occupation: Actor • Writer • Special Appearances • Producer • Voice Cast • Dialogue Writer
cast.description: One of the most popular and successful actors of Tamil Cinema, Vijay Sethupathi`s rise to fame and stardom is phenomenal.
Popularly known for her portrayal of gold-medallist wrestler Babita Kumari Phogat in Dangal, Sanya Malhotra is an Indian actress.

Priyamani is a highly respected Indian actress who started her career in the entertainment business as a model. She is been one of the most talented multilingual artists, who has appeared in films across different languages including Kannada, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and Malayalam.
More than a decade since her electrifying Bollywood debut in Om Shanti Om (2007), Deepika Padukone has carved a niche for herself as one of the most influential artists in contemporary Indian cinema.

movies.name: KGF
movies.description: A period drama set in the 1970s, KGF follows the story of a fierce rebel who rises against the brutal oppression in Kolar Gold Fields and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

cast.description: Yash is an Indian actor who primarily works in the Kannada film industry. He is one of the highest paid and most bankable stars of the Kannada film industry.

Model-turned-actress Srinidhi Shetty first rose to prominence in 2016, when she won the Miss Supranational India title in the fourth edition of Miss Diva contest in 2016. Born in Mangalore, Karnataka, she graduated with a degree in electrical engineering from Jain University in Bangalore before turning to modelling, and eventually, acting.

Hailing from Karnataka, India, Achyuth Kumar is an Indian actor, who primarily works in the Kannada film industry. He gained recognition for his roles in movies such as Josh (2009), Lucia (2013), Drishya (2014), and Mr. and Mrs. Ramachari (2014).

A trained Bharatanatyam dancer, Malavika Avinash has been training in the dance form since she was five years old. During a performance, where she was playing the role of Krishna, she was she was spotted by well-known Tamil director G. V. Iyer, who cast her in his 1988 Kannada movie Krishnavataar.

Priyamani is a highly respected Indian actress who started her career in the entertainment business as a model. She is been one of the most talented multilingual artists, who has appeared in films across different languages including Kannada, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and Malayalam.

Vasishta N. Simha is an Indian actor who works primarily in Kannada cinema. He made his acting debut in the 2013 film Arya`s Love and rose to prominence through his portrayal of the main antagonist in the 2014 romantic drama Raja Huli. Since then, Vasishta has appeared in supporting roles in several films, notably Rudra Tandava (2015) and Godhi Banna Sadharana My Kattu (2016), the latter of which won him a Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actor and a SIIMA Award for Best Actor in a Negative Role.

movies.name: 12th Fail
movies.description: Based on Anurag Pathak`s bestselling novel of the same name, 12th Fail depicts the true story of an IPS officer Manoj Kumar Sharma hailing from a small town in Chambal, who fearlessly embraced the idea of restarting his academic journey and reclaiming his destiny at a place where millions of students attempt for the world`s toughest competitive exam, UPSC.

cast.description: Started his career in popular television shows and films, Vikrant Massey has now become one of the most sought-after actors in the digital entertainment industry. In his early days of career, he was best remembered for his work in Colors TV`s socio-drama Balika Vadhu.

Harish Khanna is an Indian film actor. He made his debut with Hazaar Chaurasi Ki Maa (1998). He went on to star in films like Kachche Dhaage (1999), Charas: A Joint Effort (2004) and 7 Islands and a Metro (2006).

Priyanshu Chatterjee is an Indian film actor and model who has done notable work in Bollywood and Bengali cinema. After his debut with the 2001 movie Tum Bin, his notable performances were seen in movies such as Bhoothnath, Moner Manush, Julie, and Pinjar.

Vasishta N. Simha is an Indian actor who works primarily in Kannada cinema. He made his acting debut in the 2013 film Arya`s Love and rose to prominence through his portrayal of the main antagonist in the 2014 romantic drama Raja Huli. Since then, Vasishta has appeared in supporting roles in several films, notably Rudra Tandava (2015) and Godhi Banna Sadharana My Kattu (2016), the latter of which won him a Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actor and a SIIMA Award for Best Actor in a Negative Role.

movies.name: Tiger 3
movies.description: Tiger and Zoya are back - to save the country and their family. This time it`s personal!

cast.description: Known as the bad boy of Bollywood, Salman Khan is one of the most charismatic, flamboyant and commercially successful actors of Hindi cinema.

Born on 16th July 1983 in Hong Kong, Katrina Kaif is a British-Indian actress, model, and philanthropist. She is one of the most commercially successful actresses in Bollywood and has acted in a couple of Malayalam and Telugu films as well.
Known as the `serial kisser of Bollywood,` Emraan Anwar Hashmi is one of the most talented and versatile Indian actors who appears in Hindi movie.

Asha Kutty Nair, better known by her stage name Revathy, is a noteworthy film actress and director, known for her work in the South Indian film industry, especially in Tamil and Malayalam cinema. Revathy, with her career spanning more than 30 years, has appeared in more than 100 movies across Tamil, Malayalam, Telugu and Hindi language films.

cast.occupation: Assistant Director • Producer • Director • Writer • Actor
cast.description: Hailing from Delhi, Maneesh Sharma is an Indian film director, screenwriter, and producer, working in Hindi film industry. He is known for his directorial prowess in Bollywood films such as Band Baja Baraat and Ladies Vs Ricky Behl.

One of the most bankable names in the Indian entertainment industry, Aditya Chopra, the son of the legendary Yash Chopra is an Indian director, producer, screenwriter, distributor and the creative head of Yash Raj Films.

movies.name: Interstaller
movies.description: A team of explorers travel beyond this galaxy through a newly discovered wormhole to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

cast.occupation: Actor • Producer • Voice Cast • Executive Producer
cast.birthplace: Uvalde, Texas, United States Of America
cast.description: Matthew McConaughey is an Academy Award-winning American actor known for starring in several genres including comedy, thrillers, and drama.

Anne Jacqueline Hathaway, is an American TV and film actress and singer. She has portrayed popular characters in comedy films like The Princess Diaries and Bride Wars, for which she won the Teen Choice Award for Choice Movie Actress - Comedy.

Casey Affleck is an American actor who is the brother of famed actor and director Ben Affleck. He rose to prominence with his roles in Gus Van Sant`s films, including To Die For (1995), Good Will Hunting (1997) and Gerry (2002). Casey was also a part of the super hit Ocean`s Trilogy (2001-2007), appearing as Virgil Malloy.

cast.occupation: Actor • Executive Producer • Voice Cast • Producer
cast.description: The British film legend, Sir Michael Caine, is an English actor who is known for his peculiar accent. Caine has appeared in over a 100 films in his career which began in the 1960s. Working in the industry for more than five decades, Caine has starred in movies such as Zulu (1964), The Ipcress File (1965), The Italian Job (1969), and Battle of Britain (1969).

Jessica Michelle Chastain is an American actress and film producer known for movies like The Tree of Life (2011), Zero Dark Thirty (2012) and The Help (2011). She made her acting debut with Dan Ireland`s Jolene (2008). One of her initial big breaks came when she played a young Rachel Singer in the espionage thriller The Debt (2010).

cast.birthplace: Jonesboro, Arkansas, United States Of America
cast.description: Wesley Cook Bentley is an American actor best known for his roles as Ricky Fitts in the comedy-drama movie American Beauty (1999).

movies.name: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
movies.description: The third installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy, Star Wars : The Rise of Skywalker starts a year after the events of The Last Jedi.

cast.birthplace: San Diego, California, United States Of America
cast.description: An ex-Marine Corp turned actor, Adam Driver rose to fame for his role as Adam Sackler in the HBO comedy-drama TV show, Girls. The theatre, TV and film actor received three consecutive Primetime Emmy Award nominations for Outstanding Actor in a Comedy Series from 2013 to 2015

Daisy Ridley is a British actress who is best known for essaying the role of Rey in the Star Wars sequel trilogy. She started out on television, appearing in minor roles in shows like Casualty, Youngers and Silent Witness before making her feature film debut in the horror thriller Scrawl (2015).

cast.birthplace: Fountain Valley, California, United States Of America
cast.description: Keri Russell is an American actress, born in Fountain Valley, California. She started her career by joining the Mickey Mouse Club in 1991.

cast.spouse: Calista Flockhart, Melissa Mathison, Mary Marquardt
cast.description: Born to Dorothy Ford, a homemaker, and former radio actress, and Christopher Ford was an advertising executive and a former actor, Harrison Ford is an American actor and producer. He attended a drama class in his senior year at college to overcome his shyness.

Oscar Isaac Hernandez Estrada, popularly known as Oscar Isaac, is a Guatemalan-American actor. He first rose to prominence when he portrayed Saint Joseph in the biblical film The Nativity Story (2006), and subsequently appeared in supporting roles in films like Agora (2009), Balibo (2009) and Drive (2011).

Best remembered for playing the role of C- 3PO in the Star Wars film series, Anthony Daniels is an English actor and mime artist who is the only actor to have worked in all the major films in the series. The actor has also worked in many of the series` spin-offs.
